mapper.select: SELECT u.user_id, u.name, u.phoneNum, u.gender, u.email, u.username, u.role, u.gym_name, GROUP_CONCAT(pe.exercise_name) AS preferred_exercises FROM users u LEFT JOIN preferred_exercises pe ON u.user_id = pe.user_id WHERE u.username = #{username} AND u.password = #{password} GROUP BY u.user_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (name, birthDate, phoneNum, gender, email, username, password, role, security_question, security_answer) VALUES (#{name}, #{birthDate}, #{phoneNum}, #{gender}, #{email}, #{username}, #{password}, #{role}, #{securityQuestion}, #{securityAnswer})
mapper.select: SELECT username, security_question, security_answer FROM users WHERE email = #{email} AND name = #{name}
SELECT username, password, security_question, security_answer FROM users WHERE email = #{email} AND name = #{name} AND username = #{username}
mapper.update: UPDATE users SET name = #{name}, email = #{email}, phoneNum = #{phoneNum}, gender = #{gender}, profile_image_url = #{profile}, gym_name = {gymName}, is_private_account = #{isPrivateAccount} WHERE user_id = #{userId}
